text: Eghtɨ tav nɨn ararem baraghan markɨ. Nɨ nɨmɨra ikɨ uan navir averiamɨn aven osemegh. Nɨ zurara ami moghɨn uan inim isɨ uan dapanim gikeghɨva uan dagarir asuabar aghuigh, egh gumazim aremezɨ me a bagh aziava amir araziba, nɨ dar amuan markɨ. Nɨ uan guam avan markɨ. Egh nɨ azia itir darazi nɨ danɨngamin daghebar aman markɨ.”
